% NOTE: Run Pi monitor during flight:
% ssh niche@10.0.0.119
% while true; do echo "$(date) | CPU: $(top -bn1 | grep 'Cpu(s)' | awk '{print $2}')% | RAM: $(free -m | awk 'NR==2{printf "%s/%s MB", $3,$2}') | TEMP: $(vcgencmd measure_temp)"; sleep 5; done | tee ~/pi_hardware_log_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).txt
